oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman poisons: their names given in Bushman, but the remarks respecting them in English only, after =kasin (L IV.-1. 3472-3480). Names and descriptions of poisons, including where they are found and how they are used and prepared, and their effects on people and the game they have shot for eating. 1) Date on p.3479: 10 November, 2) This story is found in Book IV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !gweh or Malkop Gift (poisons)
